template<class T>
T Euclidean2 (  const T *  a,
const T *  b,
int  n

Returns the euclidean distance of 2 vectors raised by the power of 2.

Parameters:
a The vector a.
b The vector b.
n The number of dimensions.
Returns:
The Euclidean distance raised by the power of 2.
